post.author: 최덕선

comment.author: 이성기
comment.content: 캐나다시민권자들에게도 이런 패키지를 준다면 미국IT시장이 상당히 좋아진것을 의미하는 것 같습니다.

post.content:
Hi Travis, I'm sending this email because we have recently aquired a new client, J.P. Morgan Chase, a global financial powerhouse that operates out of 50 countries. They have moved their IT Development to Houston, Texas. As a result of expansion they are looking for a number of FULLTIME Application Developers with strong server side C++ or Java experience with current or prior experience in OOA/OOD, UML and RDBMS. These positions would be located in Houston, Texas. In order to qualify you must have 5-10 years of experience, a 3yr Degree or a 2yr Diploma with 3yrs Canadian work experience and be a Canadian or U.S. Citizen. This is an exciting opportunity for someone who is open to relocating to Houston. The salary's are very competitive and all come with a signing Bonus and relocation assistance. The tax rates are much lower than here and the average Temperature is much higher. A complete benefit package is provided as well.If you have an interest or know of anyone that wants to relocate, please contact me so we can discuss this further. I should mention that they may consider contractors but have a strong preference for FULLTIME people. Thanks Tim
Tim Powell Manager, Strategic Recruiting Modis International Tel.: 416-492-5656 ext. 224 e-mail: Tim.Powell@modisit.com web: www.modisit.com
post.title: IT Opportunity in the U.S
